ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE Log_Entries.Log_Path_U *EQ '/var/log/' *AND *VALUE Log_Entries.Log_Name_U *EQ 'messages' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *EQ 'eth' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *EQ 'NIC' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *EQ 'Link is Down' ) *OR ( *VALUE Log_Entries.Log_Path_U *EQ '/var/log/' *AND *VALUE Log_Entries.Log_Name_U *EQ 'messages' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *EQ 'Link down' ) ) *UNTIL ( *TTL 0:01:00:00 )
